text: Shlomo Gazit (; 1926 – 8 October 2020) was a Turkish-born Israeli military officer and academic. He was a Major General in the Israel Defense Forces. He was in charge of Israel's Military Intelligence Directorate. He later was President of Ben-Gurion University and head of the Jewish Agency. He was born in Istanbul. Gazit died on 8 October 2020 at the age of 93.הלך לעולמו ראש אמ"ן לשעבר, שלמה גזית ==References== Category:1926 births Category:2020 deaths Category:Turkish Jews Category:Naturalized citizens of Israel Category:Israeli generals Category:Israeli educators Category:People from Istanbul
title: Shlomo Gazit
